info.title: Traffic Monitor API
info.description: This API is defining a subset of the Axway API-Gateway Admin-Node-Manager API ([Official Docs](http://apidocs.axway.com/swagger-ui/index.html?productname=apigateway&productversion=7.7.0&filename=api-gateway-swagger.json)) with the purpose to replace the implementation with an Elasticsearch datasource instead of the API-Gateway internal OPSDB.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
Alternatively to the VIDUSR cookie you can also provide an HTTP Basic Authoritation header for a valid ANM user. 
If this user is NOT an API-Gateway Admin the user must exists on the API-Manager as well.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: If using the cookie, it must contain the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM.

parameters.name: csrf-token
parameters.description: This is required if the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM is used.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: If given, the search will be performed on regional index.

parameters.name: jmsPropertyName
parameters.description: Name of a JMS-Request property

parameters.name: jmsPropertyValue
parameters.description: Value of a JMS-Request property

get.summary: Seach requests to build Traffic-Overview table
get.description: This endpoint is used by the API-Gateway Traffic-Monitor to search for processed requests and create the Requests-Table.
Retrieves information about the executed policies and filters associated to a transaction identified by its correlationID and serviceID

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: If given, the search will be performed on regional index.

parameters.name: cookie
parameters.description: If using the cookie, it must contain the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM.

parameters.name: csrf-token
parameters.description: This is required if the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM is used.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Alternatively to the VIDUSR cookie you can also provide an HTTP Basic Authoritation header for a valid ANM user. If this user is NOT an API-Gateway Admin the user must exists on the API-Manager as well.

parameters.name: serviceID
parameters.description: instance of the API Gateway e.g.instance-1

parameters.name: correlationID
parameters.description: Transaction ID

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: If given, the search will be performed on regional index.

parameters.name: cookie
parameters.description: If using the cookie, it must contain the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM.

parameters.name: csrf-token
parameters.description: This is required if the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM is used.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Alternatively to the VIDUSR cookie you can also provide an HTTP Basic Authoritation header for a valid ANM user. If this user is NOT an API-Gateway Admin the user must exists on the API-Manager as well.

get.description: Retrieves information about events associated with the specified correlationID and legID

parameters.name: serviceID
parameters.description: instance of the API Gateway e.g.instance-1

parameters.name: serviceID
parameters.description: instance of the API Gateway e.g.instance-1

parameters.name: correlationID
parameters.description: identifies the transaction

get.description: Retrieves trace information associated to a transaction identified by its correlationID and serviceID

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: describes the result format (only json is supported; if not applied it is defaulted to json anyway)

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: If given, the search will be performed on regional index.

parameters.name: cookie
parameters.description: If using the cookie, it must contain the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM.

parameters.name: csrf-token
parameters.description: This is required if the VIDUSR cookie from the ANM is used.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Alternatively to the VIDUSR cookie you can also provide an HTTP Basic Authoritation header for a valid ANM user. If this user is NOT an API-Gateway Admin the user must exists on the API-Manager as well.

get.description: Endpoint triggered to load the transaction payload

parameters.description: If given, the payload is taken from the region folder
